comments.body: Does this print the path to the installed library (which I think would be very helpful when debugging!)

Yes, it prints that.

And thanks for having seen the mixmcx file committed by mistake

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +77,81 @@#---Handle BLAS dependent code. -----------------
if(BLAS_FOUND AND imt)
   message(STATUS "Using TMVA-DNN with BLAS installation: ${BLAS_LIBRARIES}") 
  set(DNN_CPU_LIBRARIES MathCore Matrix ${BLAS_LINKER_FLAGS} ${BLAS_LIBRARIES} ${TBB_LIBRARIES} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT}) 
  include_directories(SYSTEM ${TBB_INCLUDE_DIRS})
